alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Jeff Davis (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 3:57PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Coffee and southwestern Jeff Davis Counties through 445 PM EST... At 357 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Ambrose, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Broxton, Ambrose, West Green and Pridgen. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
